Question: Basement Defender, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Basement Defender, LLC

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Sump Pump Monitor & Alarm
- Patented technology tests pumps daily
- Sends alerts via Wi-Fi
- Monitors temperature and humidity
- Compatible with Android and Apple devices
- Free app with customizable alert settings
- Easy installation
- Works with most sump pumps with mechanical float switches
- Includes 12 months of daily testing and alert service
- Proven reliable technology
- Protects against basement flooding
- Tested and approved by industry experts
Summary_cn:
地下室防御者有限责任公司

2024国际消费电子展（CES）产品亮点：

- 下水井泵监测器与警报器
- 专利技术每日测试泵机
- 通过Wi-Fi发送警报
- 监测温度和湿度
- 兼容安卓和苹果设备
- 免费应用，可自定义警报设置
- 安装简便
- 适用于大多数带有机械浮子开关的下水井泵
- 包含12个月的每日测试和警报服务
- 经过验证可靠的技术
- 防止地下室洪水
- 经行业专家测试和批准
